longBusinessSummary.0: Sapphire Foods India Limited owns and operates restaurants in India and internationally. It also engages in the franchisee business. As of March 31, 2022, the company owned and operated 263 KFC and 219 Pizza Hut restaurants in India, 90 Pizza Hut and 5 Taco Bell restaurants in Sri Lanka, and 1 KFC and Pizza Hut restaurant in Maldives. Sapphire Foods India Limited was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Mumbai, India.
